trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> computed from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> computado dos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that provides custom positioning for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que fornece o posicionamento personalizado de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of possible <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement" /> positions for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de possíveis posições de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> com relação ao <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: When the Popup is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando o pop-up for exibido, um ponto é escolhido que maximiza a quantidade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> janela está visível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> classes each define a property of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> classes cada definem uma propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>.
